text: We don't have any photos at all!
Ah, I see. We're missing my photos...

But, you know, that's okay, right?
What we need are photos of everyone in Houkura.

But...
even though Producer-san is here too...

Then, can I join in sometimes too? It wouldn't be good for me
to appear in official photos, but I'd like some for memories.

Wow!
Sure! I'll take lots of photos!

We're going for a walk now!
Would you like to come along, Producer-san!?
I want to take photos together!

Oh, then let's go together.
Let's take turns occasionally, I'll also take photos of Kaho.
